game_description: Your space station on Mars is on the brink of collapse. Will you and your fellow players be able to save the station from mandatory evacuation? Or are you a mole working to take it down? "Decommissioned: A VR Social Deduction Showcase" is a futuristic multiplayer gaming experience jam-packed with teamwork and betrayal. It's your job to figure out who within your group is actively sabotaging the game. - Host up to 8 players - Full support for both hand tracking and controllers - Social presence with Meta Avatars Decommissioned is an open source project for Meta Quest developers. Source code and assets can be found on GitHub at https://github.com/oculus-samples/Unity-Decommissioned - Oculus Social Platform Features (Invites, Group Launch, Group Presence, Blocking flow) - Multiplayer using Meta Avatars - Gameplay using Interaction SDK - Photon Voice and Oculus Audio Spatialization
review_1: This game looks very interesting and fun to play, however, I could not go into the other rooms . I ￼could only get to the hacking station. Also because it's new, there weren't other players online which is fine, but it would be good to add bots to play with. Also better tutorials, showing how to get into the other rooms to do other tasks... please fix as I can tell there is much potential.
review_2: I want to play, but it's permanently stuck on the loading screen.
review_3: The game is really good but my character keeps spawning in the wrong place, can’t play the game much
